snippet: Some of the journalists who left had requested that their articles be removed from the coming issue, former staff members said.
abstract: New Republic magazine says it will not publish its December issue, but will return to newsstands in February of 2015; decision follows resignation of dozens of its top editors and contributors in wake of rumors that editor Franklin Foer would be replaced by Facebook founder Chris Hughes.
lead_paragraph: Some of the journalists who left had requested that their articles be removed from the coming issue, former staff members said.

headline.main: After Exodus, The New Republic Cancels Its Next Issue
headline.print_headline: After Exodus, the New Republic Cancels Its Next Issue
